snippet.title: Trine 4 - Modus Indie Access #1 | Making the Series
snippet.description:
Go behind the scenes with the indie devs who brought the Trine Series to life. Pre-order Trine 4 now: https://www.trine4.com/#store

Watch the first ever Modus Games Indie Access video and get an insider’s view on how Frozenbyte is creating the magic of Trine 4: The Nightmare Prince, which is coming to PlayStation 4, Nintendo Switch, Xbox One, and PC this fall.

Located in Helsinki, Finland, Frozenbyte candidly reflects on their decade-long career and discusses how the studio has refocused itself, returning to its roots to bring fans the most robust and complete Trine game to date. With a mesmerizing soundtrack, beautiful backdrops, a revamped combat system and much more, Trine 4: The Nightmare Prince has a whole lot of magic coming your way!

Pre-order now: https://www.trine4.com/#store
Find us on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/690640/Trine_4_The_Nightmare_Prince/
Like on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ModusGames/
Follow on Twitter: https://twitter.com/modus_games
Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/pVPYFbD
